scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c red,cyan "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.lint: npm --prefix server run lint:fix && npm --prefix client run lint:fix && npm --prefix server run format && npm --prefix client run format
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix server install --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix client install --legacy-peer-deps
